description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-29999), it is important to apply the relevant patches provided by Microsoft. Follow these steps:

1. Identify your system's version using the build numbers listed below.
2. Download and install the appropriate KB updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Restart your system to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- The relevant KB articles for this update are:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running an affected version mentioned in the build numbers below:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3593
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3593
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22000.2960
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19045.4412
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19044.4412

Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
